For The Reader

Author]306-the author contact ann for the reader author ’s note :

[I]0-i Choose [You]307-you is the third book of the Billionaire Brothers Series , but even so , it is a standalone . Therefore , [you]307-you need n’t read the previous two before reading [I]0-i Choose [You]307-you . This book ends the series , so there is a bonus at the end : a Series Epilogue . If [you]307-you have not read the previous two books , [you]307-you may just skip along to the ‘ Trev and [Krissy]72-krissy ’ epilogue — that ’s if [you]307-you do n’t want to read about [the other couples]308-the other couples . Whether this story works for [you]307-you or not , [I]0-i appreciate [you]307-you taking the time to read it . And , oh … Happy reading !

Dedication

For [all the one - woman soldiers out there]309-all the one - woman soldiers out there , treading life ’s rocky roads on [their]309-all the one - woman soldiers out there own . This is to let [you]307-you know , [you]307-you are not alone . Never stop believing in [yourself]307-you because [others]310-others have stopped believing in [you]307-you . [Everyone]311-everyone , that includes [you]307-you , has [their]311-everyone season . Just wait …

Appetizer

Broken Wing]312-emily dickinson appetizer broken wing ( Written in Shakespearean English ) by : S. [Ann Cole Angel]65-angel , Perfection is [thy]313-thy name . But , [Angel]65-angel , Why art [thou]314-thou maim ?

[Angel]65-angel , [You]307-you were sent to mend . But , [Angel]65-angel , Why on [I]0-i doth [thou]314-thou depend ?

[Angel]65-angel , [I]0-i await from [thee]314-thou [my]0-i token . Wait , [Angel]65-angel , Art [thou]314-thou wing truly broken ?

[Angel]65-angel , [I]0-i art [a sinner]315-a sinner , [I]0-i art [a mortal]316-a mortal , [I]0-i art too blemished For [thy]314-thou perfection

But , [Angel]65-angel , If [thou]314-thou sayest [Thou]314-thou art imperfect [I]0-i ’ll mend [thy]314-thou wing To [thy]314-thou satisfaction .

And , [Angel]65-angel , If [thou]314-thou [druthers To stay impaired]317-druthers to stay impaired , [I]0-i ’ll give [thee]314-thou a smile For being as guile

Because , [Angel]65-angel , [I]0-i stumbled in love Upon first sight , [With an eye of flaw With emotions raw]318-with an eye of flaw with emotions raw .

[Angel]65-angel , [I]0-i prithee , Say [thou]314-thou art imperfect , So [I]0-i can free [thee]314-thou , And make [thee]314-thou [my]0-i perfect …

Mortal .

Chapter 1 [T. Nelson Angel]74-t. nelson angel ’s Feather [His]319-he name was [Trevillo Marco - Dean Nelson]75-trevillo . And [he]319-he was [a hellion]320-a hellion . Okay , okay , [he]319-he was n’t really [a hellion]320-a hellion . But [people]322-people tended to refer to [him]319-he as such ; [he]319-he merely acknowledged it being said . [Rakehell]76-rakehell , [miscreant]323-miscreant , [asshole]324-asshole , [Devil Boy]325-devil boy were just a few of the disparaging names [he]319-he ’d been dubbed . For the life of [him]319-he , though , [he]319-he could n’t understand why . [He]319-he was n’t [a bad person]326-a bad person . Not to [himself]319-he , at least . [He]319-he was [an extremely wealthy man who provided jobs and opportunities for a decent living for thousands of people around [the globe]328-the globe]327-an extremely wealthy man who provided jobs and opportunities for a decent living for thousands of people around the globe . [He]319-he governed incalculable charities , fed [the poor]329-the poor , clothed [the unclothed]330-the unclothed , and helped [the underprivileged]331-the underprivileged . For heaven ’s sake , [he]319-he rebuilt [an entire parish]332-an entire parish after [that bitch of a hurricane]333-that bitch of a hurricane twirled [her]333-that bitch of a hurricane destructive little skirt tail across [several states]334-several states and uprooted a vast amount of lives and [homes]335-homes . Talk about ‘ [home - wrecker ’]336-home - wrecker ’ . So , [you]337-you see ? [He]319-he was n’t too bad . Actually , [he]319-he considered [himself]319-he as normal as [any other human being]338-any other human being . There were just two ( 2 , dos ) small ( teeny , tiny ) defects of [his]319-he — or unredeemable habits , [one]339-one could say , that made [truly normal people]340-truly normal people deem [him]319-he rotten : One , [he]319-he fucking swore a lot . Two , [he]319-he was [a proud enabler of adultery]341-a proud enabler of adultery and consciously steered clear of [any female sector whose ages were below [his]319-he on the calendar]342-any female sector whose ages were below his on the calendar . Did it make [him]319-he a hellion because [he]319-he enjoyed spraying F - bombs on [everyone]311-everyone like a swear - word confetti gun ? Or because [he]319-he enjoyed dating screwing around with [women who were five to ten years [his]319-he senior]344-women who were five to ten years his senior , married , engaged , or otherwise entangled ? No ? [He]319-he did n’t think so either . It ’s not like [he]319-he was strapping goddamn bombs to [his]319-he chest , robbing [banks]345-banks , blowing up [airplanes]346-airplanes , hitting on [pregnant women]347-pregnant women , peeping through [little boys]348-little boys ’ windows with [his]319-he dick in [his]319-he hand , or sending naked pictures of [himself]319-he to underage vaginas … Guess [the world]349-the world saw [him]319-he in a different light than [he]319-he did . To [himself]319-he , [he]319-he was just [Trevillo Marco - Dean Nelson]75-trevillo : [a good guy]350-a good guy . [A really good guy]351-a really good guy . [You]352-you ’ll see . Then , perhaps , [you]352-you ’ll agree . At present , [he]319-he was trapped within the confinements of [[his]319-he office]353-his office with [[his]319-he gayer of [the gayest male assistant]355-the gayest male assistant , [Milo]77-milo , browsing through potential design plans for one of [[his]319-he new tower loft constructions]356-his new tower loft constructions]354-his gayer of the gayest male assistant , milo , browsing through potential design plans for one of his new tower loft constructions . And [he]319-he was scowling with sheer displeasure . The designs were drafted by [one of [[his]319-he best designers]358-his best designers]357-one of his best designers ; yet , they came across as trite and uninspiring . With a sharp shake of [his]319-he head , [Trevillo]75-trevillo leaned back in [his]319-he comfortable leather chair , “ [I]319-he ’m done . ”[319-he] [Milo]77-milo glanced at [him]75-trevillo from across [his]77-milo large oak desk , brows raised . “ [You]75-trevillo ’re cutting [her]357-one of his best designers ? [Sarah James]78-sarah is [[your]75-trevillo supposedly ‘ best ’ designer]3111-your supposedly ‘ best ’ designer . [You]75-trevillo ’ve been using [her]357-one of his best designers on all the top projects for years . ”[77-milo] “ Exactly . And now [she]357-one of his best designers ’s grown comfortable , which has rendered [her]357-one of his best designers predictable . [She]357-one of his best designers keeps recreating the same thing every time . [I]77-milo need newness . Innovation . Daring designs . [Sarah]78-sarah ’s just not delivering anymore . ”[77-milo] [Milo]77-milo nodded in agreement . [An exceptional assistant for the last five years]359-an exceptional assistant for the last five years , [he]75-trevillo was about five feet four inches short , with a wiry frame and a gay attitude . [He]75-trevillo kept [his]75-trevillo hair trimmed in a spiky blonde Mohawk , had a wide gauge piercing on one ear and a cage piercing on the other . [Trevillo]75-trevillo did n’t force [him]75-trevillo to wear a three - piece suit — [he]75-trevillo [himself]75-trevillo detested suits — [he]75-trevillo permitted [Milo]77-milo to wear whatever [he]77-milo wanted , so [Milo]77-milo was always dressed in [his]77-milo customary steel - toed boots , tight jeans with studded belts , and stretchy rocker T - shirts . Many times , [he]77-milo was asked why [he]77-milo hired [a freak]360-a freak for [an assistant]361-an assistant . A careless shrug would always be [his]77-milo reply . Why not hire [a freak]360-a freak for [an assistant]361-an assistant ? See , [Trevillo Nelson]75-trevillo was unconventional in every sense of the word , so [he]75-trevillo was perpetually doing the opposite of whatever was expected . Screw world order . [He]75-trevillo was rich , [he]75-trevillo was powerful , [he]75-trevillo was [the boss]364-the boss , and [he]75-trevillo could do whatever the hell [he]75-trevillo wanted . [Some]365-some called it rebellion , but [he]75-trevillo called it shitting - on - dumb - ass - rules . [Milo]77-milo was n’t [a freak]360-a freak , anyway . [He]77-milo was just gay . “ That ’s true . However , [you]368-you ca n’t drop [Sarah]78-sarah at this moment . [The Skylark penthouses]3112-the skylark penthouses , or shells , are already two months behind [your]368-you planned schedule , and they need to be completed and crossed off the list . [You]368-you ’ve got a lot of food crowding [your]368-you already laden table , so [you]368-you need to clear some of these small dishes before the big ones start falling off and smashing into pieces . “[77-milo] Taking a chance on [a different designer]367-a different designer — who [you]368-you ’d be putting a helluva strain and pressure on , by the way — to get [these penthouses]369-these penthouses ready on time , might not be the smartest idea right now . [You]368-you can always dump [Sarah]78-sarah after this project . ” That was the answer [he]75-trevillo never offered to [people who inquired about [his]75-trevillo freak of [an assistant]361-an assistant]3113-people who inquired about his freak of an assistant . [Milo]77-milo was n’t [a mere assistant]3115-a mere assistant . [Milo]77-milo kept things leveled , pointing out the obvious to [him]77-milo when [he]77-milo was being blind and irrational . Being [the boss]364-the boss did n’t deter [Milo]77-milo from telling [him]364-the boss point blank when [he]77-milo thought [he]77-milo was sticking [his]77-milo head too far up [his]77-milo ass . [Milo]77-milo knew [his]77-milo shit better than [those sniffy punks in sharp charcoal suits]3117-those sniffy punks in sharp charcoal suits . So , there [you]370-you have it , [he]77-milo hired [a weird , gay assistant]3118-a weird , gay assistant because [he]77-milo kicked ass … or licked it … or sticked it … or all the above . “[370-you] [You]370-you ’re right , [Milo]77-milo . But as [you]370-you know , [these apartments]371-these apartments are unfairly overpriced . [They]371-these apartments ’re all sold out because [pompous buyers]372-pompous buyers are expecting something above what ’s already out there . This , ” [Trevillo]75-trevillo said , turning around [his]75-trevillo laptop to face [Milo]77-milo , “[370-you] is average . The same ole ’ shit that ’s been in [Sarah]78-sarah ’s last three projects , with just a slight difference . “ [You]370-you know what kind of [customers]3119-customers [I]77-milo have . Customers who never question price because [they]3117-those sniffy punks in sharp charcoal suits know [[The Dean]75-trevillo ’s Realty]3120-the dean ’s realty always delivers . If [each new building]3121-each new building does n’t transcend in creativity , notices will be made that [I]77-milo ’m [a fucking dickwad]3122-a fucking dickwad with [my]77-milo prices . Which [I]77-milo am , of course . But , who gives a shit about the price tag as long as [they]3117-those sniffy punks in sharp charcoal suits ’re happy with the product ? [Sarah]78-sarah ’s not gon na work . ”[77-milo] [Milo]77-milo glanced at the computer screen and shrugged . “ So what ’re [you]75-trevillo going to do , then ? Want [me]77-milo to send out notification emails to [the buyers]3123-the buyers , informing [them]3123-the buyers completion dates are being pushed back a few months ? [It]3124-it ’s construction . [I]77-milo ’m pretty sure [they]3123-the buyers ’ll understand that shit happens sometimes . ”[77-milo] “ Shit happens . But not with [me]75-trevillo . [I]75-trevillo ’ve got [a rep]3125-a rep to maintain . ”[75-trevillo] [Trevillo]75-trevillo rubbed [his]75-trevillo forehead in thought . “ Who do [I]75-trevillo have that can deliver this project on time with a commendable design ? ”[75-trevillo] [Milo]77-milo raised a censorious brow , “ [All [your]75-trevillo designers]3126-all your designers are not just good , but great at what [they]3126-all your designers do , or else [they]3126-all your designers would n’t be working for [you]75-trevillo . Who do [we]3134-we have ? ”[75-trevillo] “ [The design department of [The Dean ’s Realty]3120-the dean ’s realty]3135-the design department of the dean ’s realty has [110 interior designers]3137-110 interior designers . So the answer to that is ‘ [you]75-trevillo have a lot ’ . The real question is ‘ who ’s not working on a project at the moment ? ’ . ”[75-trevillo] [Trevillo]75-trevillo glared across [his]75-trevillo desk with a look that told [[his]75-trevillo assistant]373-his assistant if [he]75-trevillo did n’t cut the excessive chatting , [he]75-trevillo was going to knock [his]75-trevillo ass out . Cold . [Milo]77-milo burst out laughing and held [his]77-milo hands up in surrender . “ Alright , alright . Lemme check . ”[77-milo] [He]77-milo flipped open [his]77-milo MacBook and tapped a few keys , while [Trevillo]75-trevillo opened a drawer on [his]75-trevillo desk and retrieved [his]75-trevillo stress ball . Time , [No Friend of [Mine]0-i]2610-no friend of mine

Time plays , Time assays , Time frays , But time never delays .

Time makes , Time breaks , Time deflates , But time never waits .

Time steals , Time heals , Time reveals , But time never stills .

Have [you]2611-you time in this short life ? Seize it !

Love , and let love . Fight , and make up . Resist , and give in . Steal , and do n’t return .

Because Time is [no friend]2612-no friend — [We]2609-we laugh to cry , [We]2609-we live to die . Seize the day !

About [The Author]297-the author

S. [Ann Cole]65-angel is [a passionate writer and reader]3095-a passionate writer and reader , and a lover of anything that distracts [her]65-angel from [the real world]3096-the real world . [Ms. Cole]293-ms. cole is not [[your]3097-your typical girl]3098-your typical girl . [She]293-ms. cole hates chocolate , candle - lit dinners and all that hearts and flowers stuff makes [her]293-ms. cole feel awkward , coffee makes [her]293-ms. cole drowsier than ever , and [she]293-ms. cole tends to talk to [herself]293-ms. cole , a lot . Having an obsessive and unquenchable affair with the written word , [she]293-ms. cole ’s naturally [a recluse who dwells inside [her]293-ms. cole imagination and has to suffer continual bashings from [[her]293-ms. cole friends]3694-her friends for being [a neglectful pal who does nothing but sit around the computer]3101-a neglectful pal who does nothing but sit around the computer all day , writing .
